title: Binance bleeds: Massive $800 million asset outflow in 24 hours
description: Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, has experienced a staggering $900 million asset outflow within a mere 24-hour timeframe. This drastic movement comes in the wake of CEO Changpeng Zhao’s (CZ) guilty plea and subsequent resignation, coupled with a heavy fine imposed on both him and the exchange. title: A new chapter: How the Binance-DoJ settlement benefits all
description: In a landmark development that has sent shockwaves through the cryptocurrency world, Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) has agreed to a guilty plea in a case brought by the U.S. Justice Department. The settlement involves CZ paying a $50 million fine, while Binance is set to pay a whopping $4.3 billion. CZ’s sentencing is deferred ... Read more

title: John Reed Stark details why Binance, DOJ actions are victory for SEC
